00096 void pickFilter::filterWindow(window windowList[], int size, int sec) {
00097         
00098         for ( int i = 0; i < size; i ++ )
00099         {
00100                 
00101                 window *nextWindow = &(windowList[i]);
00102                 list<long> *nextNdxpkList = &(nextWindow -> ndxpk);
00103                 list<string> *nextPickList = &(nextWindow -> pickList);
00104                 list<double> *nextTimeList = &(nextWindow -> timeList);
00105                 list<long>::iterator ndxpkIterator;
00106                 list<string>::iterator pickIterator;
00107                 list<double>::iterator timeIterator;
00108                 
00109                 // Maximum sayida pick in hangi pickTime'a sahip eleman ile başladığını bul
00110                 int maxpickInSubWindow = 0;
00111                 list<double>::iterator maxTimeIterator = NULL;
00112                 for( timeIterator = nextTimeList -> begin(); timeIterator != nextTimeList -> end();
00113                                  timeIterator++ ) 
00114                 {
00115                         int picksInSubWindow = 0;
00116                         list<double>::iterator tempTimeIterator;
00117                         for( tempTimeIterator = nextTimeList -> begin(); tempTimeIterator != nextTimeList -> end();
00118                                  tempTimeIterator++ ) 
00119                         {
00120                                 if (*timeIterator + sec >= *tempTimeIterator && *timeIterator <= *tempTimeIterator)
00121                                 {
00122                                         picksInSubWindow++;
00123                                         if (i == 8)
00124                                         {
00125                                                 cout << "timeIterator: " << *timeIterator << " sec: " << sec << " tempTimeIterator: " << *tempTimeIterator << endl;  
00126                                         }
00127                                 }
00128                         }
00129                         if (picksInSubWindow > maxpickInSubWindow)
00130                         {
00131                                 maxpickInSubWindow = picksInSubWindow;
00132                                 maxTimeIterator = timeIterator;
00133                         }
00134                 }
00135                 if ( maxTimeIterator != NULL )
00136                         cout << "window: " << i << " " << "maxpickInSubWindow: " <<  maxpickInSubWindow << " maxTimeIterator: " << *maxTimeIterator << endl; 
00137                 
00138                 // Yukarda bulduğun maximum sayıda pick veren elemana göre pick listesini hazırla,
00139                 // alakasız pickleri sil
00140                 for( ndxpkIterator = nextNdxpkList -> begin(),pickIterator = nextPickList -> begin(),timeIterator = nextTimeList -> begin();

00143                 {
